name: places/ChIJ-zShJAxZwokRjJLCKubC6aM
formattedAddress: 462 1st Ave. Bldg F, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 462 1st Ave. Bldg F, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I was there yesterday trying to pick up my glasses, Gigi was very nice and helpful, she measured my frame and adjusted them to make sure it was to my satisfaction.  But in my visit I witness how an employee from the hospital showed behavior not appropriate towards the optical employees.  From what I heard she was a doctor, she walked in demanded to be seen immediately by the eye doctor not taking in consideration of others waiting, basically to skip everyone.  The staff there complied because of all the disruption she was causing, but she was extremely rude towards “Gigi” because she is the one that assisted her after the doctor had checked her.  She felt entitled because she was a doctor who works in the hospital and therefore can be extremely rude to others, I can't imagine how she treats all the other working staff in the hospital who is below her, sad that a doctor who is supposed to save lives doesn't have respect or compassion for others.  I wanted to put this review to let you know what a great staff you have working here, from the doctor, to Gigi and Liz, but most importantly so that you are aware of what they go thru and the abuse that they endure by “their own peers” from the field, but someone should report this to the Hospital’s HR department, how their hired employees and perhaps even on the clock show a behavior that is of concern as they don’t represent their ethics and values of compassion, dignity and respect to everyone.

originalText.text: This review is for the Cohen's Fashion Optical @ Bellevue Hospital Center.  I have been having issues with my vision and glasses after a recent eye exam at Optic Shades - (Jena) Optical.  I called Cohen's @ Bellevue and asked if I could be seen today.  The answer was yes so I headed over to get an eye exam.  I was greeted as I walked in and Liz assisted me throughout the entire visit.  I waited roughly 2 mins for Dr. Jacobson and she was fantastic.  I was so concerned and nervous about what I thought was a drastic change in my vision and she tested me and realized that the previous Dr. @ Optic Shades - (Jena) Optical had given me an incorrect prescription.  I met with Liz directly after and she assisted me with picking new glasses and we talked about changing the lens on my current, incorrect glasses.  She then proceed to tell me to try and contact the eyewear company where I purchased the glasses to see if maybe, there was a warranty.  Sure enough, the eyewear company was kind enough to replace the glasses with the current prescription I received from Dr. Jacobson.  Liz went above and beyond to help me realizing that a huge error was committed by a previous Dr. and understanding that I could not spend so much more money on new lenses and glasses after only a couple of months.  I ended up purchasing an extra pair of glasses from Cohen's @ Bellevue at a reasonable cost.  Thank you!!

originalText.text: Since I was 14 I been getting my glasses from this place. Before, staff used to be really nice and they showed that they cared. Now, the new staff is completely rude. They don't know anything about customer service. My advice is don't go there they will waste your time and treat you awfully.

text.text: Since I was 14 I been getting my glasses from this place. Before, staff used to be really nice and they showed that they cared. Now, the new staff is completely rude. They don't know anything about customer service. My advice is don't go there they will waste your time and treat you awfully.

originalText.text: As many others have said, the staff is rude and unprofessional. I work in the building and although this store is incredibly convenient for me and can save me a lot of time, I will never return. It simply isn't worth it to have this much stress and frustration to do something so simple as make an appointment and get an eye exam. The optometrist does not listen or answer direct questions and is clearly inexperienced. In thirty years of getting exams and glasses at dozens of optical businesses over the years in multiple states, I have never had service this poor. This may sound like I am exaggerating, but I assure you, I am not. You and I deserve much better than this.

originalText.text: I really should have listened to the countless reviews about how horrible the service was, however being my own person and not be influenced by others easily is one of my admirable qualities and now my curse. The staff was extremely unprofessional and the provider had to leave early, the staff forgot to inform me causing me to travel for no reason! They did not even apologize. Do not use them!
